channel.title: Fiagaro PM2 won't open.
channel.description:
Hi There,
Just installed Whonix 11 on a new machine and updated. Was working fine.
Just tried to open Figaro PM2 and got the following error.
Profile: /usr/bin/whonixcheck Operation: open Name: /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/protobuf-2.6.1-nspkg.pth Denied: r Logfile: /var/log/kern.log For more information, please see: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DebuggingApparmor
I really need a password in there, can anyone help me try to fix?
Ta.
PS1

item.title: Fiagaro PM2 won't open.
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
PS1:

Just installed Whonix 11

I don’t think Whonix 11 -> 13 upgrade has been well tested. You should probably install the latest distribution.

PS1:

Just tried to open Figaro PM2 and got the following error.

The error is unrelated to FPM2. Error is caused by whonixcheck running in the background. See if running FPM in a terminal produces any meaningful output.

FYI anyone who cares, protobuf is Google’s Protocol Buffer parser. It’s most likely installed using Python’s PIP tool.

@ramongalaxy
Profile: /usr/bin/whonixcheck Operation: Open DENIED Name: /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist/package/protobut-2.6.1-nspkg.pth

Read full topic
